name: BLOCK-T215
configuration_schema:
$schema: http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#
title: BLOCK-T215 configuration
description: Configuration for BLOCK-T215.
type: object
properties:
  run_filter:
    description: ComCam filter to use.
    type: string
    default: "r_03"
  run_target_sky_counts:
    description: Target sky counts.
    type: number
    default: 15000
  run_max_counts:
    description: Max sky counts.
    type: number
    default: 80000
  run_n_flats:
    description: Target number of flats.
    type: integer
    default: 10
  run_dither:
    description: Dither distance in arcsec.
    type: number
    default: 10
  run_max_exp:
    description: Maximum exposure time allowed.
    type: number
    default: 300
  run_distance_from_sun:
    description: Distance from sun in degrees.
    type: number
    default: 179.0
  run_target_el:
    description: Target elevation for sky flats.
    type: number
    default: 45.0
  run_max_sun_el:
    description: Maximum sun elevation.
    type: number
    default: -5.0
  run_min_exp_time:
    description: Minimum exposure time.
    type: number
    default: 1
  run_tracking:
    description: If true, track the telescope.
    type: boolean
    default: True
  run_point_directly:
    description: If true, point directly. If false, point relative to sun.
    type: boolean
    default: False
  run_target_az:
    description: Target azimuth position.
    type: number
    default: 90.0
